description:
Kurumaki Zakuro is http://anidb.net/ch3396 [Rin]`s first friend and the first demon hunter who made an attack on Sakurashin. Zakuro is a necromancer and is capable of controlling anything that was once living, but is now dead, along with other yokai.
After the fight she began working in the same noodle delivery store as Rin.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kurumaki Zakuro
